abstract: The 20 in 20 is such a great idea!!!! Thank you in advance for showing us all of Paris like this! 😍
This is one of your best ideas EVER Jay. Thanks again for showing us Paris.

Jay I love your channel.  You are part of my daily life ... even though we’ve never met.  Thanks for all you do.  How you balance yourself on that device, navigate Paris, hold a camera in focus and entertain your audience with delightful banter is beyond amazing.  It should be an Olympic sport.  You rock!!!!
